name: Caked Out
description:
Grab a friend and stretch out your fingers for some quick moving keyboard controls! Caked Out is a colorful, finger-twitching culinary experience. Share up to 12 key controls to decorate increasingly demanding cakes. Stay sharp! You never know when your decorating tools may change!

How To Play

  • Press the corresponding key to follow the recipe, at the bottom of the screen.
  • Just like baking a cake, order is important. Fill your cake before you frost it, then add details and a cake topper.
  • The cake machine has a habit of spinning the decorating tools from time to time. Stay on your toes and ready to re-position at a moments notice.
  • When the going gets tough...get another pair of hands!  Ask a friend to help you decorate the cakes in time.
